value:
$WmMPID_ジェイガン,ch01_14_Jeigan_M_Normal,Face|$w0|For Prince Marth! For the restoration
of Altea! I may be old, but I will not be
beaten. Not yet!$k$p

$WmMPID_ナバール,ch01_02_Nabarl_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I feel bad killing you, but it was your
mistake to come here.$k$p

$WmMPID_ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Normal,Face|$w0|On my honor as a knight of Macedon,
I promise you a fair fight! Prepare
yourselves!$k$p

$WmMPID_シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I am Princess Caeda of Talys.
I'm also a pegasus knight, though
perhaps an unconventional one.$k$p

$WmMPID_花嫁シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Do you believe in love everlasting?
I have faith in the power of love... I
always have and always will.$k$p

$WmMPID_カミュ,ch01_15_Camus_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I am a knight. I have a duty to fight till
the very end. So long as my hands
can grip Gradivus, I won't falter.$k$p
